00020 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00021 #ifndef _ANALYSISSTAGE_H_
00022 #define _ANALYSISSTAGE_H_
00023 
00024 #include <map>
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 class AnalysisStage {
00029 
00030 public: 
00031 
00032   static std::string nameFromSpec(const std::string &spec) {
00033     std::string name;
00034     if(spec.find(".") != string::npos) {
00035       name = spec.substr(0, spec.find("."));
00036     }
00037     else {
00038       name = spec;
00039     }
00040     return name;
00041   }
00042 
00043   static std::vector<AnalysisStage> makeStages(const string &spec, 
00044                                                std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods) {
00045     assert(!spec.empty());
00046     std::string description;
00047     bool doingStdMethod = false;
00048     std::vector<std::string> words;
00049 
00050     /* Check for one of our std methods. */
00051     if(stdMethods.find(spec) != stdMethods.end()) {
00052       doingStdMethod = true;
00053       description = stdMethods[spec];
00054     }
00055     else {
00056       description = spec;
00057     }
00058 
00059     Util::chopString(description, ',', words);
00060     if(words.size() < 2) {
00061       Err::errAbort("Must specify at least a pm adjustment and summary type.");
00062     };
00063 
00064     std::vector<AnalysisStage> stages;
00065     // The first n-2 steps are chipstreams
00066     for(size_t i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00067       AnalysisStage cStage;
00068       cStage.spec = words[i];
00069       cStage.name = nameFromSpec(cStage.spec);
00070       stages.push_back(cStage);
00071     }
00072 
00073     return stages;
00074   }
00075 
00076   std::string spec;
00077   std::string name;
00078   
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif // _ANALYSISSTAGE_H_
